title: Journal: The Annie Restaurant, Houston, Texas, United States
content: I am here in Houston I arrived at Houston and I have a flight from Houston to Sandy Santiago Chile and the United Airlines CA 847 it's a long flight but I still have four more hours to go I seem in the Annie's restaurant and eat red fish look at the picture it's amazing I love it it's so good and I'm still excited for the trip thank you bye
location: The Annie Restaurant, Houston, Texas, United States

title: Journal: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Right now it's gone from the airplane skylines on the way to Mendoza for the first time in my life they look very very different but they both are beautiful and amazing every time you watch such beautiful view I would like couple pictures with this block to make good magnificent will be in Mendoza next 15 minutes we're pretty close I look forward to worry about the street people mountains and everything thank you
location: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Today is day three of the trip last night I arrived here in Mendoza today is a third day December 27 and actually no plans today I would be just walking ahead and get around the hotel in order just to fill the place one thing that really really surprised me since yesterday was in the sun here at around 9 PM which was really really interesting to me because I've never seen son sitting at nine you know it was a long long day for me and even today this morning you wake up at the sun rises at eight for 645\+630 so it's interesting I mean like the city of Mendoza looks beautiful it's greenery everywhere the roots have a big big old trees very strong and very old trees people look fancy most of the people wear white dresses here which is very cool hot temperature and the short even the boys most of the boys even the older men's they are wearing the short switch has glitter interesting to me but you know it's good I also saw my favorite board pigeon flying here and there I love it I love pigeons is good to see that these houses very familiar in Kathmandu Nepal where I was born and raised so it looks very very homely environment to you I'll catch up later again thank you have a great day bye
location: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Sitio de Memoria D2, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Hello just a quick update on weather it's very interesting weather here it says if you sit in the seat and Wendy's I see cool wings you feel cold when you go to the sun it's very warm and very nice weather is very very interesting so many temperature difference between the cold wind and the one that's all for now thank you bye Mendoza
location: Sitio de Memoria D2, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Yes 7 PM here in front of hotel diplomatic in Mendoza the sun is pretty high and strong it's going to stay at 9 o'clock so it's going to be a long day the second long day in south hemisphere today I made my friend Ian and his two son and we know him once I did Kilimanjaro so they are joining the same trip here with Akana Cagua it's going to be fun here and then after that I went to my hotel room and try to make sure that I am I can use the television but I couldn't because it's in Spanish and I called so many people to help me with changing English and they can't do it even they can't change to the title or whatever it is called so but so interesting and then after that I I

title: Journal: Sitio de Memoria D2, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina
content:
Yeah and I was chilling that I was watching the movie of the guy who climbed Mount Everest 21 times so you know like amazing story but he says something very important that has always well that has always been in my heart he says that mountains people who are living in the side of the mountains is really really all about Nepal and mountains and so I'm not under the mountains and it really touches my heart and I feel a little bit emotional every time I saw this kind of videos with kids run and can cannot go to the school and can eat food and sit in the extreme poverty like even in this world this kind of poverty do exist and it does exist so you know it makes me kind of emotional not like right for a couple of seconds but good to cry good to feel good and I'm still crying and have so many drops in my eyes and it's interesting we'll see how it goes yeah good thank you thank you for listening
Yeah and I was chilling that I was watching the movie of the guy who climbed Mount Everest 21 times so you know like amazing story but he says something very important that has always well that has always been in my heart he says that mountains people who are living in the side of the mountains is really really all about Nepal and mountains and so I'm not under the mountains and it really touches my heart and I feel a little bit emotional every time I saw this kind of videos with kids run and can cannot go to the school and can eat food and sit in the extreme poverty like even in this world this kind of poverty do exist and it does exist so you know it makes me kind of emotional not like right for a couple of seconds but good to cry good to feel good and I'm still crying and have so many drops in my eyes and it's interesting we'll see how it goes yeah good thank you thank you for listening

title: Journal: Restaurant, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Day four December 28 I wake up around 7 o’clock slept really well outside looks sunny and beautiful then I went for the breakfast. It was really good. I enjoyed the breakfast so today the guy is going to inspect our gears around 3 o’clock so that’s to be a big thing to do today beside that we will be just hanging in there and yes, the guys are back in the town Ian and his two sons. I had a good time with them yesterdayand hope to have more on the coming days. Thank you and have a great day.
location: Restaurant, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina
content: For continuous so we had our first briefing about the expedition and there were four guides from the team one of the guide view from Echo to help us out and then there was a gear inspection it looks everything is good to me but I realize that I missed one middle size glove so I'm going to buy the globe tomorrow morning so tomorrow will move to this tomorrow will leave this hotel and go to the next place where the mountain Trail is located that's all for today have a wonderful day bye
location: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Carretera Libertador General San Martín, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: So the three we arrived at Phoenix where we gave our backpack place where you start getting that tomorrow we head to the trailhead and start the day one of the contact along the way it was a mountainous route very narrow big mountains that I seen in the pool it's very similar to that and the mountains look very very not green they look like they are more like a deer mountain so it's really really might be 4000 5000 feet or something along that line so then we had a launch at a place where it was it was amazing very good lunch I even don't remember what I had but I would have some pictures of food in this in this in this journal but the sitting style lead tonight we are we are going to see the city like a Dorito style so it's going to be interesting because there are so many people in that room at least nine people in that room and sleeping together so but anyway it was a great day amazing day all day we came in the bus and got a bus trip and everything looks good and really sunny right now it's windy but it's beautiful out here thank you

title: Journal: Carretera Libertador General San Martín, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: December 30 we are at the Aconcagua trailhead and there are some paperwork being done to make sure that we have necessary permits and paperwork done so after that we will be heading towards the Aconcagua now the day one fun begins

title: Journal: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: So this is the first first time of our trip and it's been a in an hour a little more maybe something like that a couple of things we see the trail looks very very like a Rocky Mountains here and there is a small river that flows in between the river and then the thing is what we do is the trailer is in the in between the two mountains so basically we are walking on the bank of the river all the time not a lot of free you know some straps you can see here here out there but I think it is but it still a beautiful flowers the white flowers purple flowers and I love flowers the most exciting part so far is that the movie is carrying the Lord from upper Camp down to the trailhead and the mall where walking with our with all the loads it was quite fascinating this is something I compare most of the time with the moon and yak in every space when you do the paper space can you see the all kind of things it's quite interesting that here in Argentina they don't have because like it the ball but the moon looks pretty familiar and similar to me and that's all for today I will meet you in the break thank you bye
location: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Finally we had our first lunch it was really good just to send with him geez it's all it is I'm there in the bank of River out here and then I see those swallow in my really really like that board since since I was a kid and I had always wanted that board to be inside our house but never follow from San Diego to Nepal we will be heading soon thank you so much have a great day
location: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

content: We arrive at the first base camp Ina is 2950 m and there is a small red post here which is here and they can see a lot of move getting our stuff I'll put some pictures later and there are other team seem to bring in so it's pretty exciting here whether it looks not too bad it's not too cold all right have a great day bye

title: Journal: Camping Pampa de Las Leñas, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Again good morning today is the day too in the trail December 31, 2025 very beautiful day new year Eve today's going to be the longest I care worry about 1617 km 6\+ hours of hike and then we reach to the second camp everybody is excited we just had a breakfast and it's 813 now more more more more to come thank you and have a great day
location: Camping Pampa de Las Leñas, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: So we are having lunch right now is the lunch break again the sandwich and cheese sandwich biggest apple I've ever eat it's a big valley beautiful it's big very big valley you can see the moon taking out suitcases duffel bags to the upper camp and coming back it's really beautiful here one thing that surprised me was like I saw a different kind of animal I've never seen before it's in the camel family I have to figure it out what exactly it is another thing I really like about this place there are a lot of birds here so many different kind of birds we are almost half the way this is one of the longest day of our track hopefully will be done in next three hours and will be in the second camp and will be spending in there our time New Year's Eve happy new year everyone thank you bye
location: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Seccional Guardaparque Pampa de Lenas, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Did the other thing I saw was like a horse in this trail in this camp one one board that really interest me looks like a sparrow but it has a orange snake maybe a kind of sparrow there are other smaller colorful boards too but it chirping this morning and it's really beautiful out here the sun has already hit the top of the mountains and we are getting started here thank you and have a great
location: Seccional Guardaparque Pampa de Lenas, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

content: Finally we are almost at the gate to maybe 15 minutes away but the good thing is we just so that I can go out for the first time it looks like a roller coaster in this side I didn't know which side it is maybe not I see the picture I can see that the bigger one is that come amazing amazing I love it thank you bye

title: Journal: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Happy new year everyone it's 2026 what a beautiful day for me in the heart of the Acura Mountain we're on the way to the base camp probably one and a half hours more to go and we have seen the mountain very closely today and mountain looks very happy with us hopefully there is no new storm and would be able to submit in couple of days thank you guys for following me I'll keep your posted thank you bye
location: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

content: 92 at Akakuu Mountain guides Plaza Argentina which is actually the best camp of Aconcagua and we are having rest day today so no activities are planned so will be just staying at rest too Plaza Argentina today and resting for today have a great day thank you bye

content: Play this game

content: It's Monday, January 5 got here at base camp of Akakoa in Mendoza Argentina today will be blowing up a stream to the campground and will be staying there really beautiful dear one thing that really is here is most people on our side managing the steps you know how they are going to take care of our steps and logistics and move these things to the upper camp they're working with the yard and marking things and everything looks good it's going to be a beautiful day here so very beautiful morning have a great day and enjoy the rest of the day thank you
location: Plaza Argentina Base Camp, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Hello everybody I am in the base camp too it's Wednesday, January 7 and it's snowing outside I would like a couple of more pictures later of Cantu but we are going to rest for tomorrow and do the Lord carry and finally move to the base camp one day after tomorrow no it's after day it's really cold here but I've seen the panoramic view of the Indies mountains Gloucester is like him less it looks a little bit different it's beautiful amazing you love it make your trip go for it thank you and welcome to camp too
location: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: 98 2026 we are in camp too and today is resting day we are on the way to submit Mount Aconcagua it's really a very cool day today because it snowed since yesterday and it's only snowing all day but 2 feet of snow or something like that I've never been to this environment before so it's quite challenging for me to navigate around the place so we'll be doing carry load tomorrow and we'll have opportunities to see the camp and stay tuned thank you
location: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Still at Bica too January 9, 2026 last night it was a big big snowstorm came here about 2 feet of storm we're supposed to do the Lord carry today to the campground but we decided to stay in camp to and to assume sightseeing hiking today was really scary because the temperature was -20°C which I never been accustomed to but I'm glad the gear I bought including the most important sleeping bag was really working well it was cold here in there but I slept very well which is quite interesting I haven't been sleeping well industry till today sometimes when I look at the distance I feel like the snow will be me you know it will will be killed in the snow ever on top of this this is what it call dance see the pictures thank you bye
location: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Today is a Friday, January 9, 2026 still we are on the way to Summit Aconcagua we are right now at the camp too tomorrow morning will head towards the camp one couple of training we did today in the camp too the first training was related to Cranbourne I've never used the crampon in my life and it's amazing to see how that tiny metal creature works in a way I never had imagined in the snow so we learn how to walk with the crampon how to run with the damn cramp and probably how to dance with the grandpa see the pictures thank you and have a great day
location: Parque Provincial Aconcagua, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Travesía, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Today is a sunny day it was really hard day because there was a snowstorm couple of days back and they will buy us some snow in the mountain but we decided to attempt as we continue to caravan this journey to raise the top of the mountain we started at 3 o'clock in the morning and there were all the teams to were trying to achieve their own goals submitting the mountain Cagua and unfortunately because of the snow we could put reach on the we couldn't reach the last 500 m 500 m of the mountain it was not real to explore there was nothing there there was only chance of snow so due to safety reason all the teams meeting the amount I can go come back from that point it is a surreal moment you can see the entire end is reason of mountains I'm still tired it'll take two hours to come back to the tent and I'm sleeping and recording this thank you and have a wonderful day
location: Travesía, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Public Toilet, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina
content: This is a chemical Agua Plaza demos base we have arrived here today will be the last day last day in the camp then after that we will walk towards the Mendoza and somewhere in between will catch the bus and then we will reach our hotel this place looks beautiful small valleys surrounded by a snow cat mountains it's really good looks nice out here I saw Nipun everywhere in the different camps when we are coming down today and it's really cool and I like it thank you so much Bye
location: Public Toilet, Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Nelly we arrived at diplomatic hotel last night it was very tiring day I had a dinner at 11 PM we hiked about 26 km it was a very very long day and this ends the official process of packing trip this morning we meet with guides and give them thankful of love and hope and you know appreciation that we can think about and also give the tip money we had a breakfast I thought I had a flight today but realized that I had a flight on Friday so I had to reschedule my stay here and I will be flying on Friday happy Aconcagua thank you
location: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina
content: Today is completely a rest day I stayed at hotel for sometime in later waiting for a haircut one day I realized about haircut here is amazing this is one of the best place I've ever been in different part of the world and do the haircut every place where I go it seems that this is the best place to have a haircut they can many stars and they are very professional they're really good in using seizures and the machine balancing the way you want so it's amazing I really really really like it literally later on the way I bought some chocolate just how the windows are chocolate looks like you finally I have a sushi sushi as a dinner that we are going out again for some food and drinks and that's on for today thank you and have a great day bye
location: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina
content: I'm getting ready to go to the airport but before going to the airport I decided to go back to the casino I went last night to draw the money and this morning I was able to draw about 30,000 peso which I need to tip the driver and buy some stamps in the airport my last goodbye to the city of Mendoza and this diplomatic hotel where I'm staying right now hope to see you in soon in the future I'm pretty committed that I'll come back and do the I will come back and wrap off the unfinished business stuff I can this time is a little bit weather related scenario that I don't have any control on which I feel pizza with the moment of dry a moment of song I am learning Mendoza bye-bye Mendoza
location: Diplomatic Hotel, Capital, Mendoza, Argentina

title: Journal: Pisco Bar 360º, Pudahuel, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile
content: Arrived at Chile Santiago airport is a nice airport I love it and right now I'm drinking the orange juice and chicken wrap at Lulu Park life in a bowl this place looks pretty cool like I like the design of this airport it's not so crowded it has a lot of things to buy if you have money in willing to spend money on it again from GA Santiago Santiago Chile I will flight at 10:15 I have to wait for the next couple of hours to get to catch the flight to Houston thank you and have a great day bye
location: Pisco Bar 360º, Pudahuel, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile

title: Journal: McDonald's, Pudahuel, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile
content: Are you chicken sandwich at McDonald's just want to test whether it is different than in the United States or not so I find it similar but I don't know I just eat chicken sandwich and fries it was pretty good and here is the picture of the McDonald's at Santiago airport in section C
location: McDonald's, Pudahuel, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile

title: Journal: C10, Houston, Texas, United States
content: This morning around five I arrived at Western Airport it was pretty quiet it was nine hours flight from Santiago Chile to Houston and then I was trying to figure out how I can go early back to home in San Diego then I realize that there is a 930 flight to San Diego I called United Airlines staff and make necessary changes so that I can fly at 9:30 instead of three saving a lot of hours and maybe have some fun at home because I'm really really tired of this trip but I'm little bit worried about my bag because it's already checked in and maybe the bag will come little later I don't know how it works so I'm just wondering when this place will open with is CNCEC terminal gate number 10 where I can board the new airplane at nine I'll keep you updated have a great day thank you so much
location: C10, Houston, Texas, United States
